description: The year for which the New Year's resolutions were made.
The age demographic of the respondents, such as 18-24 years or 55 and over.
The gender of the respondents, categorized as male or female.
Whether the respondent has made a New Year's resolution.
Whether the respondent kept all, some, or none of their resolutions from the previous year.
The type of resolution made, such as doing more exercise, losing weight, improving diet, saving money, or home renovation.
The driving reason behind the resolution, with categories such as health improvement or financial savings.
Comparison between resolutions made in the current and previous year in relation to saving money, home renovation, etc.
